law.catch_line: The proper jurisdiction for recording all deeds or other instruments referred to in §§ 3-101 and 3...
law.text:
The proper jurisdiction for recording all deeds or other instruments referred to in §§ 3-101 and 3-102 is as follows:
In the county where the land affected by the deed or instrument lies; or
If the land lies in more than one county, in all of such counties.
